{"id":1024729040,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1692351644,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"41 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1024729040/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Determine the Winner of a Bowling Game","memory":"72.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int isWinner(vector<int>& player1, vector<int>& player2) {\n        int score1 = calculateScore(player1), score2 = calculateScore(player2);\n        \n        if (score1 == score2)\n            return 0;\n\n        return (score1 > score2)? 1 : 2;\n    }\n\n    int calculateScore(vector<int>& p) {\n        int res = 0;\n        for (auto i = 0; i < p.size(); i++) {\n            if (i >= 1 && p[i - 1] == 10)\n                res += 2 * p[i];\n            else if (i >= 2 && p[i - 2] == 10)\n                res += 2 * p[i];\n            else\n                res += p[i];\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"determine-the-winner-of-a-bowling-game","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
